Reviews.Title: For the Price: Worth more than paid for
Reviews.Author: mg75
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a inexpensive, larger laptop than can do most anything a normal everyday human being wants....this is the one to get. ( I have two different model Toshiba Satellite Laptops and they both perform equally as well ). Handles high end games quite well as long as your not super cranking up graphics.Only con is the Keyboard layout and button feel...but you kinda forget about it and get use to it.

Reviews.Title: Needed to purchase
Reviews.Author: Phyllis
Reviews.Content: Since Microsoft was no longer going to support my XP system, I needed to get a different unit. so I went with theToshiba and like it.

Reviews.Title: awesome laptop!
Reviews.Author: vm
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our Grandson for his birthday. He loves it & is already using it in school. Does everything he asks of it. Arrived as ordered & shipping/packing was excellent.

Reviews.Title: meets expectations
Reviews.Author: billy
Reviews.Content: very nice computer, will do everything I need. I am still getting used to the new windows 8, but its ok.
